backend/main.mo: Defines core actor logic with mixin-based storage and authorization plus types and comparison modules for users, slots, gigs, transactions, ROI data, and usage analytics.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UX/design features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all major frontend components, pages, hooks, and styling files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and CSS variable definitions implementing OKLCH Cyber‑Noir color tokens and dark/light theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint setting favicon, metadata, root div, and loading the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, role-based routing, admin access checks, profile setup, and page‑view tracking.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Simple admin‑only access denial screen with icon, message, and back button.
frontend/src/components/AvailabilityCale: Musician availability manager allowing slot creation and availability toggling with UI cards and sorting.
frontend/src/components/BookingDialog.ts: Provides a dialog for venues to enter event details and submit a gig booking for a musician using form state and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the site header with branding, user profile dropdown, admin access button, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/MusicianSearch.t: Displays a searchable list of musicians and lets users filter and initiate booking actions from each musician card.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Handles initial user profile creation with role selection, form inputs, validation, and profile submission.
Opens a dialog that activates a camera-based QR scanner to verify musician attendance for a gig.
frontend/src/components/QRTicketGenerato: Generates and downloads simple QR-code-like images for confirmed gigs using a canvas-based pattern generator.
frontend/src/components/WalletView.tsx: Displays wallet totals and breakdown of locked, available, and paid amounts using styled cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for profiles, musicians, gigs, analytics, and usage events using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUsageTracking.ts: Records session, page view, and action analytics events when the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind CSS base styles, custom CSS variables, dark mode theme, and utility glow effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, wrapping it in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders admin analytics dashboard with KPI cards and usage event table, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDashboard.tsx: Fetches user profile and gigs, filters upcoming events by search, and displays them in a card grid.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with login flow, hero section, and search-filtered upcoming gigs preview.
frontend/src/pages/MusicianDashboard.tsx: Musician dashboard showing gig stats, wallet info, availability management, and tabs for gigs, calendar, and QR tools.
frontend/src/pages/VenueDashboard.tsx: Venue dashboard for managing gigs, booking musicians, viewing stats, and scanning QR codes for events.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters with hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, radii, fonts, shadows, and keyframes, plus plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing analytics features, Cyber‑Noir UI goals, known issues, required image assets, and existing feature definitions.
